The claim originated from an article pub: which has a history of promoting sensational and fabricated claims.
The article stated that the Federal Comm: FCC), acting on an executive order from President Obama, fined ABC for airing A Charlie Brown Christmas due to its overtly Christian references being potentially offensive and exclusionary to non-Christians.
